00036 MSHR_SA_H::MSHR_SA_H()
00037 {
00038     unsink = 0;
00039     globalUnSink = 0;
00040     lastFinishTime = 0; 
00041     done = 0;
00042     lastScheduledIndex = 0;     
00043     mshr.clear();
00044     writeQueue.clear();
00045     waiting = false;
00046     lastFullTime = 0;                   
00047 }

00211 
00212 Addr_t MSHR_SA_H::GlobalAddrMap(Addr_t addr, uint threadId)
00213 {
00214     Addr_t newAddr;
00215     unsigned int threadBits = ceil(log2(NO_OF_THREADS));
00216     unsigned int threadBitsPos = THREAD_BITS_POSITION;
00217     Addr_t lowerMask = (Addr_t)pow(2.0,threadBitsPos*1.0)-1;
00218     Addr_t upperMask = 0xFFFFFFFF << threadBitsPos;
00219     Addr_t lowerAddr = addr & lowerMask;
00220     Addr_t upperAddr = addr & upperMask;
00221     Addr_t threadAddr = (threadId & ((Addr_t)pow(2.0,threadBits*1.0)-1));
00222     newAddr = lowerAddr | (threadAddr << threadBitsPos)| (upperAddr << threadBits);
00223 //    cout << hex << addr << ", " << threadId << ", " << newAddr << endl;       
00224     return newAddr;
00225 }
00226 
00227 void MSHR_SA_H::DeleteInMSHR(Request* req)
00228 {
00229     vector<Request>::iterator index = mshr.begin();
00230     for (unsigned int i=0; i<mshr.size(); i++)
00231     {
00232         if (mshr[i].address == req->address)
00233         {       
00234             mshr.erase(i+index);
00235             lastScheduledIndex--;               
00236         //    ((GenericTPG*)parent)->roundTripLat += (Simulator::Now() - mshr[i].startTime);     
00237 #ifdef DEEP_DEBUG
00238             cout << Simulator::Now() << hex << ": Deletion Time of Request " << req->address << dec << ", of Thread " << id << ", lastScheduledIndex = " << lastScheduledIndex << endl;
00239 #endif  
00240              break;
00241         }
00242      }
00243      cout << dec;       
00244 }
00245 
00246 void MSHR_SA_H::demap_addr(Addr_t oldAddress, Addr_t newAddress)
00247 {
00248     vector<Request>::iterator index = mshr.begin();
00249     for (unsigned int i=0; i<mshr.size(); i++)
00250     {
00251         if (mshr[i].address == oldAddress)
00252         {
00253             mshr[i].address = newAddress;
00254 #ifdef DEEP_DEBUG
00255             cout << Simulator::Now() << hex << ": Replace Address " << oldAddress << " in MSHR of Thread " << id << " to " << mshr[i].address << endl;
00256 #endif  
00257             //cout << hex <<  oldAddress << " hihi " << newAddress << endl;
00258              break;
00259         }
00260      }
00261 
00262 }
